tool_description: This API returns relevant Fundamental ratios and closing price for an Equity
name: Equity Live Nav Values
title: Equity Live Nav Values

api_list.name: Equity ISIN
api_list.description: This Endpoint takes Equity ISIN as the value and returns the closing price of the Equity in return.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://equity-live-nav-values.p.rapidapi.com/INE032A01023"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "equity-live-nav-values.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://equity-live-nav-values.p.rapidapi.com/{isin}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "equity-live-nav-values.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
